original_text: whose leaves were beautiful and its fruit abundant, and in which was food for all, under which beasts of the field found shade, and in whose branches the birds of the heavens lived—
korean_text: 그 잎사귀는 아름답고 그 열매는 많아서 만민의 먹을 것이 될 만하고 들짐승은 그 아래에 살며 공중에 나는 새는 그 가지에 깃들었나이다

sentences.original_text: and in which was food for all
sentences.korean_translation: 그 안에는 모두를 위한 먹이가 있었고

sentences.original_text: under which beasts of the field found shade
sentences.korean_translation: 그 그늘 아래 들짐승들이 그늘을 찾았고

sentences.original_text: and in whose branches the birds of the heavens lived
